# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(sentence::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(sentence)
    wrapped_sentence = words[1]
    line_length = length(words[1])
    for i in 2:length(words)
        word_length = length(words[i])
        if line_length + word_length + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_sentence *= "\n" * words[i]
            line_length = word_length
        else
            wrapped_sentence *= " " * words[i]
            line_length += word_length + 1
        end
    end
    return wrapped_sentence
end

sentence = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
wrapped_sentence = wrap_string(sentence, 10)
println(wrapped_sentence)
```

Output:

```
Lorem ipsum
dolor sit
amet,
consectetur
adipiscing
elit.
```
